definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: Some selfish Chinese politicians are considered to be "typhoid Marys " to their own people.
sentences.chinese: 一些自私自利的中国政客，是自己同胞祸害的根源。

sentences.english: If I say hell, instant solutions to be proficient in his will encounter to evil.
sentences.chinese: 我若再说自己精通医道，手到病除，必将遭来祸害。

sentences.english: Whoever is greedy for unjust gain troubles his own household.
sentences.chinese: 贪爱不以之财的祸害自己的家。

sentences.english: Is war less of a scourge than an uprising is of a calamity?
sentences.chinese: 难道战争的祸害不大于暴动的灾难吗？

sentences.english: Anti-drug struggle, eliminate the drug scourge.
sentences.chinese: 开展禁毒斗争，消除毒品祸害。

sentences.english: Worthless cars abandoned on parking lots were currently a plague at every big city airport.
sentences.chinese: 丢在停车场的废旧汽车如今成了城市空港的一个祸害。

sentences.english: The ganstershave been eliminated and can no longer harm the people.
sentences.chinese: 这股顽匪已被劫灭净尽，再不能祸害百姓了。

sentences.english: Father always said Dumbledore was the worst thing that ever happened to this place.
sentences.chinese: 我爸总是说邓不利多是霍格华兹有史以来最大的祸害。

sentences.english: The greatest disaster is to take your rivals lightly; Taking them lightly nearly cost me my treasures.
sentences.chinese: 最大的祸害是轻敌，轻敌几乎能断送我的宝贝。

sentences.english: He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house.
sentences.chinese: 贪爱不义之财的祸害自己的家。

sentences.english: Speed is the curse of modern civilisation.
sentences.chinese: 速度是现代文明的祸害。

sentences.english: Attila and "scourge of God" have at one time been considered synonyms .
sentences.chinese: 阿提拉和“祸害上帝”已在同一时间被认为是同义词。

sentences.english: There is little doubt that immediate action is required to eliminate the scourge of corruption once and forever.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，必须立即采取行动彻底消除腐败的祸害。

sentences.english: Evil reputation damaged Asian compatriots, ancestors of shame for children.
sentences.chinese: 损毁亚洲同胞名声的祸害，祖先为之蒙羞的子孙。

sentences.english: Much of that will depend on how much longer the leak continues.
sentences.chinese: 这场劫难到底多大祸害，就看这油漏到什么时候了。

sentences.english: Lack of living space has been the bane of modern life.
sentences.chinese: 缺少居住空间已经是现代生活的祸害。

definition: to harm sb/to inflict suffering/to victimize/pernicious
to waste/to defile/to abuse/to insult/to defile/to trample on/to wreck/also pr. [zao1 ta5]
lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
to break the law and commit crimes (idiom); malefactor/evildoer/to perpetrate outrages
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
lit. to nurture a tiger invites calamity/fig. to indulge one's enemy is asking for trouble (idiom)
to cut weeds and eliminate the roots (idiom); to destroy root and branch/to eliminate completely
